```{r setup, include=FALSE}

library(addNarrData)
```

```{r cache = TRUE, R.options = list(width = 85)}
tibble::tibble(
  id = c('1a'), lat = c(39.19674), lon = c(-84.582601),
  start_date = as.Date("2020-03-08"), end_date = as.Date("2020-03-09")) %>% 
  addNarrData::get_narr_data(narr_variables = c("air.2m", "rhum.2m"))
```
